myopenmath.statement:
What is the total resistance of the circuit shown below? Use the formula \displaystyle\frac{{1}}{{R}}=\frac{{1}}{{R}_{{1}}}+\frac{{1}}{{R}_{{2}}} to answer this question, where \displaystyle{R} is the total overall resistance and \displaystyle{R}_{{1}} and \displaystyle{R}_{{2}} are individual resistors in parallel.
14.0 Ω90.0 Ω
Round your answer using the rules of working with measurements.
{R}_{T} = unit
To enter the unit, in the pop-up box click on the heading "vars".
